summary:
Energy industry professional with a strong passion for thriving in the energy transition.
Driver of simplification and replication through (self-initiated) digitalization applications.
Proven track record of timely, on target delivery on many simultaneous opportunities
through strong prioritization of tasks, challenging the status quo, collaborating in highly
diverse teams and effective communication and negotiation skills.
